widget.title: Desktop
widget.p: Desktop is the root pane, it contains panels (fill the available space), dialogs (centered), combolists, popupmenus, and tooltips. You can add only components and dialogs to desktop, the last will be on the top.

parameters.parameter: name, enabled, visible, tooltip, property, width, height, colspan, rowspan, weightx, weighty, halign, and valign parameters are similar to component
